definition: to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
to talk from one's personal experience/to use oneself as an example

sentences.english: Perhaps this corroborates what we say.
sentences.chinese: 也許這證實了我們的說法。

sentences.english: Can the technetium view of the outside let E people emotional desalt Ma?
sentences.chinese: 外界的鍀說法會讓莪們的感情淡化嘜？

sentences.english: So saying sodium bicarbonate julep is in fact not true.
sentences.chinese: 所以說小蘇打去黑頭的說法其實不現實。

sentences.english: I can't go along with you on that, I'm afraid.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕在這一點上無不能認同你的說法。

sentences.english: Some argue that it originates from the Zulu for 'making a loud noise'.
sentences.chinese: 有人說是來源於祖魯語中“製造噪音”的說法。

sentences.english: Currently there are different understandings and views on "XR", the technical paradigm of circular economy.
sentences.chinese: 對循環經濟的技術範式，人們有着不同的認識和說法。

sentences.english: Do you agree with me on that?
The folk has "shuts does not release, but also fine makes up the brain" view.
sentences.chinese: 民間有“閉而不泄，還精補腦”的說法。

sentences.english: Today, my 8 year old little sister said "f you" to my mom.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我8歲的妹妹對我媽說法克魷。

sentences.english: Among them, there is often a young man listening to the old monk sitting under a tree view.
sentences.chinese: 其中，有一位年輕人也常坐在樹下聽老和尚說法。

sentences.english: He dismisses the theory that Etna is from a Greek source meaning “I burn.”
sentences.chinese: 他否定了埃特納來源於希臘語“我在燃燒”的說法。

sentences.english: He has always had problems putting into words the grandeur of that moment 40 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 他一直不太接受40年前的那一刻是莊嚴壯舉的說法。

sentences.english: Yet according to Cox, yttrium was not even listed in the report.
sentences.chinese: 但根據考克斯的說法，釔甚至沒被列入這份報告之中。

sentences.english: By his own account the car was coming too fast round the bend.
sentences.chinese: 根據他本人的說法，那輛汽車拐彎時開得太快。

sentences.english: The findings contradict statements made by Halliburton in the weeks following the accident.
sentences.chinese: 該發現反駁了哈里伯頓在事故發生後一週的說法。

definition: regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
to explain/to illustrate/to indicate/to show/to prove/explanation/directions/caption/CL:個|个[ge4]
conclusion/verdict/CL:個|个[ge4]/to conclude/to reach a verdict
